messages.content: I am proud to have been selected to stand in Sittingbourne and Sheppey and I offer my commitment to fight to improve the lives of local residents.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Save our NHS. Address the shortage of GPs, reduce A&E waiting times, and improve elderly care.
Tackle the local housing crisis by increasing housing supply and updating local plans.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: National Education Service for Life Long Learning
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Improve school standards, funding, and adult education opportunities.
Support plans for a green economy to tackle the climate emergency.
Work to reduce the need for food banks and back plans to remove Universal Credit.

issues.economy: Support plans for a green economy to tackle the climate emergency.
issues.education: Improve school standards, funding, and adult education opportunities.
issues.environment: Support plans for a green economy to tackle the climate emergency.
issues.health: Save our NHS. Address the shortage of GPs, reduce A&E waiting times, and improve elderly care.
issues.socialWelfare: Work to reduce the need for food banks and back plans to remove Universal Credit.

community.content: Tackle the local housing crisis by increasing housing supply and updating local plans.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am proud to have been selected to stand in Sittingbourne and Sheppey and I offer my commitment to fight to improve the lives of local residents.

contactInformation.address: Freepost RTS-GGRJ-BHBE Sittingbourne and Sheppey CLP 29 Park Road, Sittingbourne, ME10 1DR

endorsements.endorsement: I know Clive is truly committed to improving the lives of people in Sittingbourne and Sheppey. That means jobs for families, a strong local economy, and a better local environment for generations to come.

I am delighted Clive shares my passion for keeping our NHS out of the hands of the American drug companies. He has worked with us previously against stroke services being removed from Medway Hospital.

examples: There is a shortage of GPs and it takes ages to get an appointment.
I am proud to have been selected to stand in Sittingbourne and Sheppey and I offer my commitment to fight to improve the lives of local residents.
Save our NHS.
Too many people are in need of homes they can afford and decent Government funding for schools has fallen and further education and skills are underfunded.
Support plans for a green economy to tackle the climate emergency.
I will fight for affordable local social housing.
Tackle the local housing crisis by increasing housing supply and updating local plans.
I will fight for affordable local social housing.
Improve the lives of local residents.
Support plans for a green economy to tackle the climate emergency.
Improve school standards, funding, and adult education opportunities.
@Roger Truelove: I know Clive is truly committed to improving the lives of people in Sittingbourne and Sheppey.
@Angela Harrison: I am delighted Clive shares my passion for keeping our NHS out of the hands of the American drug companies.
Tackle the local housing crisis by increasing housing supply and updating local plans.
Government funding for schools has fallen and further education and skills are underfunded.
After years of Tory austerity, families and young people are being punished. The rich live well while public services are being cut and our NHS is underfunded.
Too many people are in need of homes they can afford and decent work for a decent wage.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: I will fight hard in Parliament for your local needs.

examples: Tackle the local housing crisis by increasing housing supply and updating local plans.
Improve the lives of local residents.
